short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Files explorer for the web accessible folders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can get "Files Explorer like experience" when browsing web accessible folders.

Simply open any directory page and click the extension icon which appears to the right of your address bar OR press ALT+SHIFT+F  as a shortcut. Then the page will switch to File Explorer view which lets you view file's/folder's info (or preview video/image thumbnails if enabled) of the directory items. You can toggle the items size or sort the items as well.
